effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Raises the user’s Defense by one stage. User then charges for one turn before attacking. This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Raises the user’s Defense by one stage. User then charges for one turn before attacking. This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Raises the user’s Defense by one stage. User then charges for one turn before attacking. This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.

short_effect.sun_moon: Raises the user’s Defense by one stage. User charges for one turn before attacking.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Raises the user’s Defense by one stage. User charges for one turn before attacking.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Raises the user’s Defense by one stage. User charges for one turn before attacking.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user tucks in its head to raise its Defense stat on the first turn, then rams the target on the next turn.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user tucks in its head to raise its Defense stat on the first turn, then rams the target on the next turn.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user tucks in its head to raise its Defense stat on the first turn, then rams the target on the next turn.
